languages.text: "Было включение общей вокс-трансляции в то время как вы и госпожа Хейдари... Отдыхали. Я имею ввиду, вокс-трансляция процесса вашего отдыха".
"There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."
languages.original_text: "Было включение общей вокс-трансляции в то время как вы и госпожа Хейдари... Отдыхали. Я имею ввиду, вокс-трансляция процесса вашего отдыха".

traits.locale_text: "There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... enjoying yourself. I mean, there was a broadcast of your enjoyment."
"There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... enjoying yourself. I mean, there was a broadcast of your enjoyment."
"There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."
"There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."
"There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."
"There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."

languages.text: « Il y a eu une diffusion dans tout le vaisseau pendant que maîtresse Heydari et vous-même étiez en train de vous... détendre. En fait, c'est votre... détente qui a été diffusée. »
languages.original_text: "There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a eu une diffusion dans tout le vaisseau pendant que maîtresse Heydari et vous-même étiez en train de vous... détendre. En fait, c'est votre... détente qui a été diffusée. »

languages.text: “当您和海达利女士进行……放松的时候，整艘船进行了一次广播。我的意思是说，广播里播放了你们的休闲活动。”
languages.original_text: "There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."

traits.locale_text: “当您和海达利女士进行……放松的时候，整艘船进行了一次广播。我的意思是说，广播里播放了你们的休闲活动。”

languages.text: "Es gab eine schiffsweite Übertragung während Ihr und Herrin Heydari ... Euch entspannt habt. Ich meine, Eure Entspannungsaktivitäten wurden übertragen."
languages.original_text: "There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."

traits.locale_text: "Es gab eine schiffsweite Übertragung während Ihr und Herrin Heydari ... Euch entspannt habt. Ich meine, Eure Entspannungsaktivitäten wurden übertragen."

languages.text: «Ha habido una transmisión sobre usted y la señora Heydari mientras se estaban... relajando, y esta se ha escuchado en toda la nave. Es decir, hemos escuchado una transmisión de sus actividades de relajación».
languages.original_text: "There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."

traits.locale_text: «Ha habido una transmisión sobre usted y la señora Heydari mientras se estaban... relajando, y esta se ha escuchado en toda la nave. Es decir, hemos escuchado una transmisión de sus actividades de relajación».

languages.text: 「陛下とヘイダリ女史が…くつろいでおられる間に、船内放送がありました。その、お二人がくつろいでいる様子についての放送が行われました」
languages.original_text: "There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下とヘイダリ女史が…くつろいでおられる間に、船内放送がありました。その、お二人がくつろいでいる様子についての放送が行われました」

languages.text: "Siz ve Üstat Heydari'nin... Dinlenmesini içeren, daha doğrusu dinlenme aktivitelerinizi içeren bir yayın. Tüm gemi duydu."
languages.original_text: "There was a ship-wide broadcast while you and Mistress Heydari were... relaxing. I mean, there was a broadcast of your relaxation activities."

traits.locale_text: "Sizin ve Heydari Hanım'ın... Dinlenmesini içeren, tüm geminin duyduğu bir yayın. Yani daha doğrusu dinlenme aktivitelerinizi içeren bir yayın."
